Articles.Content:
Sooo.. Everyone by now knows about the Valentina bug.. She's really wonky with her physics. I accidently EVA"d a little too fast on the moon, hit the ground, and now she's been tumbling across the surface for the last 15 real minutes.. she hasn't stopped.. traveled a grand total of 45km... 

she just keeps going.... 

and going...

even the energizer bunny is going ...?! 

her body elongates, and rubber bands itself to shoot herself forward.. then she hits a hill or cavern and catapults up and starts her momentum back up again.. /facepalm.... 

(Suddenly I'm glad I wasn't on POL or Gilly.. she woulda catapulted herself out of orbit.)
I think all you can do here is to use HyperEdit's landing cheat to stop her movement. Not sure about how to fix this in stock.
